orderedtable.lua#

Opis#

– Equivalent of the next function, but returns the keys in the alphabetic

– order. We use a temporary ordered key table that is stored in the

– table being iterated.

–print(„orderedNext: state = „..tostring(state) )

Funkcje#

  • __genOrderedIndex( t )

  • orderedNext(t, state)

  • orderedPairs(t)
